item.title: Beyond the 9-to-5: Engineering My Path to Financial Independence
item.description:
Every morning, as I write code for someone else’s vision, I think about the products I could build, the problems I could solve, and the value I could create. Today marks the beginning of my intentional journey from software engineer to solopreneur. Here’s why I’m making this transition and how I plan to do it.

Why Now?

As software engineers, we’re uniquely positioned in today’s digital economy. We understand how to build scalable systems, solve complex problems, and create value through code. Yet many of us spend our days implementing other people’s visions rather than creating our own impact.
